lessons.title: You Are More Than You Think
lessons.description: Rediscover your strengths and ignite your dreams for digital innovation.

experience.title: Recall a Moment You Felt Proud
experience.instructions: Think of a time you achieved something meaningful. Write about it.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria wakati ulipofanya jambo lililokufanya ujivunie.
experience.example: I felt proud when I helped my sibling pass their exams.
experience.feedback_prompt: Describe the moment and explain how it could shape your future career.

reflection.title: How Did That Moment Shape You?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how the proud moment influenced your values and confidence.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Wakati huu ulikufanya uhisi vipi? Uligundua nini kuhusu wewe mwenyewe?
reflection.example: That moment taught me patience and confidence in teaching others.
reflection.feedback_prompt: What did you learn about yourself, and how can it help in your career?

conceptualization.title: What Does This Reveal About Your Values?
conceptualization.instructions: Think about what this moment says about your values.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Wakati huu unaonyesha nini kuhusu mambo unayoyathamini?
conceptualization.example: I value kindness because helping others makes the world better.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: What values did this moment highlight? How do they guide your dreams?

application.title: Create a Vision Board
application.instructions: Use Canva or Google Slides to design a vision board that connects your strengths to future goals.
application.kiswahili_support: Tumia Canva au Google Slides kutengeneza ubao wa maono unaounganisha nguvu zako na malengo ya baadaye.
application.example: I created a vision board showing my dream to start a coding school.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your vision board and explain how it reflects your strengths.

lessons.title: Dreams Define Direction
lessons.description: Explore how dreams guide your actions and how the digital space can help you achieve them.
objectives: Identify at least three digital opportunities aligned with your dreams
lessons.sdg_alignment: SDG 8: Decent Work and Economic Growth

experience.title: Recall a Dream You Had
experience.instructions: Think of a big dream you had in the past, even if you abandoned it.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria ndoto moja kubwa uliyokuwa nayo awali, hata kama uliiacha.
experience.example: I once dreamed of starting a business to teach children coding.
experience.feedback_prompt: What dream did you have in the past? Why was it important?

reflection.title: Why Did You Abandon This Dream?
reflection.instructions: Think about the reasons you stopped pursuing this dream.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria kuhusu sababu zilizokufanya uache ndoto hiyo.
reflection.example: I abandoned my dream because I lacked resources.
reflection.feedback_prompt: Why did you stop pursuing this dream? What would you do differently now?

conceptualization.title: How Can Digital Tools Help You Achieve This Dream?
conceptualization.instructions: Think about how digital tools can help you achieve your dream.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi teknolojia za kidijitali zinaweza kusaidia kufanikisha ndoto yako.
conceptualization.example: I could use YouTube to teach coding lessons online.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: List three ways digital tools can help you achieve your dream.

application.title: Find Three Digital Opportunities
application.instructions: Use Google or ChatGPT to research three opportunities aligned with your dream.
application.kiswahili_support: Tumia Google au ChatGPT kutafuta fursa tatu zinazohusiana na ndoto yako.
application.feedback_prompt: What three opportunities did you find? How do they align with your dream?

lessons.title: Resilience in Challenges
lessons.description: Learn how to overcome setbacks and develop resilience for lifelong growth in the digital space.

experience.title: Recall a Challenge You Overcame
experience.instructions: Think about a time you faced a challenge but overcame it. Write about what happened and how you felt.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria changamoto uliyoishinda na jinsi ulivyohisi.
experience.example: I failed a test but studied harder and passed the next one.
experience.feedback_prompt: What challenge did you face, and how did you overcome it? How did it shape your confidence?

reflection.title: What Did You Learn About Yourself?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how overcoming that challenge made you stronger.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi kushinda changamoto hiyo kulikufanya uwe na nguvu zaidi.
reflection.feedback_prompt: What did you learn about yourself, and how can you use that lesson in future challenges?

conceptualization.title: What is Resilience?
conceptualization.instructions: Learn why resilience is critical in life and digital careers.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze kwa nini ustahimilivu ni muhimu.
conceptualization.example: Resilience means bouncing back from difficulties.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, what does resilience mean to you? How does it connect to your dreams?

application.title: Create a Resilience Plan
application.instructions: Make a simple plan with three strategies to stay strong in difficulty.
application.feedback_prompt: Write down three strategies you can use to build resilience. Provide examples if possible.

lessons.title: Collaboration Creates Impact
lessons.description: Learn how collaboration can help you achieve bigger goals and solve societal problems.

experience.title: Solve a Problem Together
experience.instructions: Work with a peer to solve a small problem. Write about what you did together.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fanya kazi na rafiki au mwenzako kutatua changamoto ndogo.
experience.example: My classmate and I cleaned our classroom together.
experience.feedback_prompt: What problem did you solve together? How did collaboration help?

reflection.title: Why Did Collaboration Work?
reflection.instructions: Think about why collaborating made the task easier or better.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria kwa nini kushirikiana kulifanya kazi iwe rahisi au bora.
reflection.example: Collaboration worked because we divided tasks and finished faster.
reflection.feedback_prompt: Why did collaboration work, and how did it feel to work with someone?

conceptualization.title: What Makes Collaboration Powerful?
conceptualization.instructions: Learn the key elements of effective collaboration, like communication, trust, and shared goals.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze mambo muhimu ya kushirikiana kwa ufanisi.
conceptualization.example: Collaboration is powerful because it combines strengths and ideas.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, what makes collaboration powerful? How can it help solve bigger problems?

application.title: Plan a Collaborative Digital Project
application.instructions: Imagine you are working with a team to create a simple digital solution. Write down your idea and how you would divide tasks.
application.kiswahili_support: Fikiria unafanya kazi na timu kutengeneza suluhisho rahisi la kidijitali.
example: Project: Create a website to connect farmers with buyers
Roles: One collects data, one builds site, one promotes it
application.feedback_prompt: Write your collaborative project idea and how you would divide tasks among team members.

lessons.title: Creativity and Problem Solving
lessons.description: Learn how to think creatively and solve problems using digital tools.
objectives: Learn a structured approach to problem solving
Build a prototype solution using digital tools

experience.title: Identify a Real-Life Problem
experience.instructions: Think about a problem in your community or daily life that needs a solution. Write about the problem and why it's important to solve.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria tatizo katika jamii yako au maisha ya kila siku linalohitaji suluhisho.
experience.example: There's too much trash in my neighborhood. This is a problem because it makes the area unsafe.
experience.feedback_prompt: What problem did you identify, and why is it important to solve?

reflection.title: Why is Creativity Important?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on the role of creativity in finding solutions.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi ubunifu unavyosaidia kupata suluhisho.
reflection.example: Creativity helps us think of new and better ways to solve problems.
reflection.feedback_prompt: Why is creativity important, and how can it help with the problem you identified?

conceptualization.title: Steps for Problem Solving
conceptualization.instructions: Learn a simple 4-step problem-solving process: Identify, Explore, Design, and Test.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze mchakato wa hatua nne za kutatua matatizo: Tambua, Chunguza, Buni, na Jaribu.
example: Design: Mobile app to report issues
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: Write how you would use the problem-solving steps to address your problem.

application.title: Create a Prototype Solution
application.instructions: Use a digital tool (like Canva, Figma, or Google Slides) to create a simple prototype of your solution.
application.kiswahili_support: Tumia zana ya kidijitali kutengeneza mfano rahisi wa suluhisho lako.
application.example: Design a poster encouraging people to throw trash in designated bins.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your prototype and explain how it solves the problem you identified.

lessons.title: Empathy Builds Bridges
lessons.description: Learn how empathy helps create user-centered digital solutions.
objectives: Apply empathy to digital problem solving

experience.title: Interview a Peer
experience.instructions: Talk to a peer about a problem they face daily. Write down what you learned.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fanya mahojiano na rafiki kuhusu tatizo analokutana nalo kila siku.
experience.example: My peer struggles with unreliable internet access.
experience.feedback_prompt: What problem did your peer share, and how did empathy help you understand it?

reflection.title: How Did Empathy Help?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how empathy helped you understand your peer’s perspective.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi huruma ilivyokusaidia kuelewa mtazamo wa rafiki yako.
reflection.example: Empathy helped me realize how frustrating poor internet can be.
reflection.feedback_prompt: How did empathy change your understanding of the problem?

conceptualization.title: User-Centered Design
conceptualization.instructions: Learn about user-centered design and why empathy is essential.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze kuhusu usanifu unaomlenga mtumiaji na kwa nini huruma ni muhimu.
conceptualization.example: User-centered design means creating solutions that fit real user needs.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, why is empathy important in design?

application.title: Create a User Persona
application.instructions: Based on your interview, create a user persona that represents your peer’s needs.
application.kiswahili_support: Tengeneza persona ya mtumiaji kulingana na mahojiano yako.
application.example: Persona: A student who struggles with internet access but needs online learning.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your user persona and explain how empathy shaped it.

lessons.title: Leadership Through Service
lessons.description: Learn how servant leadership empowers communities and drives digital innovation.
objectives: Identify ways to lead through service
Apply leadership skills in a digital context
lessons.sdg_alignment: SDG 16: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions

experience.title: Recall a Time You Helped Others
experience.instructions: Think of a time you served others without expecting anything in return. Write about it.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria wakati ulipowasaidia wengine bila kutarajia malipo.
experience.example: I volunteered to teach basic computer skills at a youth center.
experience.feedback_prompt: Describe the situation and how serving others made you feel.

reflection.title: What Did You Learn About Leadership?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how serving others shaped your view of leadership.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi kusaidia wengine kulivyobadilisha mtazamo wako kuhusu uongozi.
reflection.example: I learned that leadership is about empowering others, not control.
reflection.feedback_prompt: What did you learn about leadership from this experience?

conceptualization.title: What is Servant Leadership?
conceptualization.instructions: Learn the principles of servant leadership and why they matter in digital careers.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze kanuni za uongozi wa kuhudumia na kwa nini ni muhimu.
conceptualization.example: Servant leadership means prioritizing the growth and well-being of others.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, why is servant leadership important?

application.title: Plan a Service-Oriented Project
application.instructions: Design a small project that serves your community using digital tools.
application.kiswahili_support: Buni mradi mdogo unaohudumia jamii yako kwa kutumia zana za kidijitali.
application.example: Create a WhatsApp group to share free learning resources with peers.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your project plan and explain how it demonstrates servant leadership.

lessons.title: Adaptability in Change
lessons.description: Learn how to thrive in dynamic environments by embracing adaptability.

experience.title: Recall a Time You Adapted to Change
experience.instructions: Think of a time you had to adjust to a new situation. Write about it.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria wakati ulilazimika kubadilika kutokana na hali mpya.
experience.example: I had to learn online classes quickly when schools closed.
experience.feedback_prompt: Describe the situation and how you adapted successfully.

reflection.title: What Did You Learn About Yourself?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how adapting to change made you stronger.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi kubadilika kulivyokufanya uwe na nguvu zaidi.
reflection.example: I learned that I can quickly adjust and still succeed.
reflection.feedback_prompt: What did you learn about yourself from adapting to change?

conceptualization.title: Why is Adaptability Important?
conceptualization.instructions: Learn why adaptability is critical in digital innovation and careers.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze kwa nini kubadilika ni muhimu katika ubunifu wa kidijitali.
conceptualization.example: Adaptability allows us to thrive in uncertain environments.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, why is adaptability important?

application.title: Create a Personal Adaptability Plan
application.instructions: Design a plan with three strategies to stay adaptable in digital environments.
application.kiswahili_support: Tengeneza mpango wa kibinafsi wa kubaki na uwezo wa kubadilika.
example: Stay open to learning new tools
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your adaptability plan and explain how it will help you thrive.

lessons.title: Communication Creates Clarity
lessons.description: Learn how effective communication builds understanding and success in digital careers.
objectives: Understand the importance of clear communication

experience.title: Recall a Time You Communicated Effectively
experience.instructions: Think of a time when you explained something clearly and it helped others. Write about it.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria wakati ulipoeleza jambo kwa uwazi na likawasaidia wengine.
experience.example: I explained how to use Google Docs to my classmates, and they understood quickly.
experience.feedback_prompt: Describe the situation and how clear communication made a difference.

reflection.title: Why Does Communication Matter?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how communication impacts teamwork and success.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi mawasiliano yanavyoathiri kazi ya pamoja na mafanikio.
reflection.example: Good communication prevents misunderstandings and builds trust.
reflection.feedback_prompt: Why is communication important in your personal or professional life?

conceptualization.title: Principles of Effective Communication
conceptualization.instructions: Learn key principles like clarity, listening, and feedback.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze kanuni kuu za mawasiliano bora kama uwazi, kusikiliza, na mrejesho.
conceptualization.example: Effective communication requires active listening and clear language.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, what makes communication effective?

application.title: Practice Digital Communication
application.instructions: Write a short email or message to a peer explaining a digital tool clearly.
application.kiswahili_support: Andika barua pepe au ujumbe mfupi kwa rafiki ukieleza zana ya kidijitali kwa uwazi.
application.example: I wrote an email explaining how to use Trello for task management.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your email or message and explain how you ensured clarity.

lessons.title: Integrity Guides Decisions
lessons.description: Learn how ethical practices and integrity shape digital careers and innovation.
objectives: Identify ethical dilemmas in digital contexts
Apply integrity to personal and professional choices
lessons.sdg_alignment: SDG 16: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions

experience.title: Recall a Time You Made an Honest Choice
experience.instructions: Think of a time when you chose honesty over convenience. Write about it.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria wakati ulipochagua uaminifu badala ya urahisi.
experience.example: I admitted to my teacher that I hadn’t completed an assignment instead of copying.
experience.feedback_prompt: Describe the situation and how integrity influenced your decision.

reflection.title: Why Does Integrity Matter?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how integrity builds trust and credibility.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi uadilifu unavyojenga uaminifu na heshima.
reflection.example: Integrity matters because people trust you when you are honest.
reflection.feedback_prompt: Why is integrity important in your personal or professional life?

conceptualization.title: Ethics in Digital Careers
conceptualization.instructions: Learn about ethical dilemmas in technology, like data privacy and plagiarism.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze kuhusu changamoto za kimaadili katika teknolojia, kama faragha ya data na wizi wa kazi.
conceptualization.example: Ethics in digital careers means respecting privacy and giving credit to others.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, why is integrity important in digital innovation?

application.title: Create an Integrity Pledge
application.instructions: Write a short pledge committing to integrity in your digital work.
application.kiswahili_support: Andika kiapo kifupi cha kujitolea kwa uadilifu katika kazi yako ya kidijitali.
application.example: I pledge to always cite sources and respect user privacy.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your pledge and explain how it will guide your decisions.

lessons.title: Vision Shapes Future
lessons.description: Learn how to craft a digital vision statement that guides your personal and professional growth.
objectives: Create a personal digital vision statement
lessons.sdg_alignment: SDG 8: Decent Work and Economic Growth

experience.title: Recall a Dream About Your Future
experience.instructions: Think of a dream you have for your future career or personal life. Write it down.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria ndoto uliyo nayo kuhusu maisha yako ya baadaye.
experience.example: I dream of starting a digital hub for youth in my community.
experience.feedback_prompt: Describe your dream and why it matters to you.

reflection.title: How Does Vision Guide You?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how having a vision can shape your decisions and actions.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi kuwa na maono kunavyoweza kuongoza maamuzi yako.
reflection.example: My vision helps me stay focused even when challenges arise.
reflection.feedback_prompt: How does your vision guide your daily choices?

conceptualization.title: What is a Vision Statement?
conceptualization.instructions: Learn how to write a clear vision statement that reflects your goals.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze jinsi ya kuandika tamko la maono linaloonyesha malengo yako.
conceptualization.example: My vision is to empower youth through digital innovation.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, why is a vision statement important?

application.title: Write Your Digital Vision Statement
application.instructions: Write a one-paragraph vision statement that reflects your goals in the digital space.
application.kiswahili_support: Andika tamko la maono linaloonyesha malengo yako katika teknolojia.
application.example: My vision is to create inclusive digital platforms for women entrepreneurs.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your vision statement and explain how it reflects your goals.

lessons.title: Digital Tools for Societal Change
lessons.description: Learn how to use digital tools to create solutions for real-world societal problems.
objectives: Apply tools to solve community problems

experience.title: Identify a Community Problem
experience.instructions: Think of a problem in your community that could be solved with digital tools. Write about it.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria tatizo katika jamii yako linaloweza kutatuliwa kwa kutumia teknolojia.
experience.example: Farmers in my village struggle to find buyers for their produce.
experience.feedback_prompt: Describe the problem and why solving it matters.

reflection.title: How Can Digital Tools Help?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on how digital tools could solve the problem you identified.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria jinsi teknolojia za kidijitali zinaweza kusaidia kutatua tatizo.
reflection.example: Digital platforms can connect farmers directly to buyers.
reflection.feedback_prompt: How could digital tools help solve the problem?

conceptualization.title: Examples of Digital Solutions
conceptualization.instructions: Learn about successful digital solutions like M-Pesa and Ushahidi.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Jifunze kuhusu suluhisho za kidijitali zilizofanikiwa kama M-Pesa na Ushahidi.
conceptualization.example: M-Pesa helped millions access financial services.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: In your own words, why are digital tools powerful for societal change?

application.title: Design a Digital Solution
application.instructions: Use a tool like Canva, Figma, or Trello to design a simple solution for the problem you identified.
application.kiswahili_support: Tumia zana kama Canva, Figma, au Trello kubuni suluhisho rahisi.
application.example: I designed a mobile app that connects farmers to buyers.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your solution design and explain how it addresses the problem.

lessons.title: Capstone Project Part 1: Building Solutions for Kenya
lessons.description: Begin your capstone project by brainstorming and planning a digital solution for a real-world societal problem.
objectives: Plan the project using digital tools
lessons.sdg_alignment: SDG 1: No Poverty, SDG 9: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure

experience.title: Brainstorm a Project Idea
experience.instructions: Think of a problem in Kenya that could be solved with digital innovation. Write down your idea.
experience.kiswahili_support: Fikiria tatizo nchini Kenya linaloweza kutatuliwa kwa ubunifu wa kidijitali.
experience.example: A mobile app to help rural farmers access market prices.
experience.feedback_prompt: Describe your project idea and why it matters.

reflection.title: Why is This Solution Important?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on why your solution matters to your community.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria kwa nini suluhisho lako ni muhimu kwa jamii yako.
reflection.example: Helping farmers access fair prices improves livelihoods.
reflection.feedback_prompt: Why is your solution important for your community?

conceptualization.title: Plan Your Project
conceptualization.instructions: Use Trello or Notion to outline tasks, roles, and timelines for your project.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Tumia Trello au Notion kupanga kazi, majukumu, na muda wa mradi wako.
conceptualization.example: We created a Trello board with tasks for design, coding, and testing.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: Upload your project plan and explain how it will help you stay organized.

application.title: Prepare for Development
application.instructions: Summarize the resources and skills needed to build your solution.
application.kiswahili_support: Andika muhtasari wa rasilimali na ujuzi unaohitajika kutengeneza suluhisho lako.
application.example: We need coding skills, design tools, and community feedback.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload your resource summary and explain how it supports your project.

lessons.title: Capstone Project Part 2: Presenting Your Solution
lessons.description: Complete your capstone project by developing and presenting your digital solution to peers and mentors.

experience.title: Develop Your Solution
experience.instructions: Use digital tools to build a prototype of your solution.
experience.kiswahili_support: Tumia zana za kidijitali kutengeneza mfano wa suluhisho lako.
experience.example: We built a simple mobile app prototype using Figma.
experience.feedback_prompt: Upload your prototype and explain how it solves the problem.

reflection.title: What Did You Learn?
reflection.instructions: Reflect on what you learned from building your solution.
reflection.kiswahili_support: Fikiria ulichokijifunza kutokana na kutengeneza suluhisho lako.
reflection.example: I learned that teamwork and planning are essential for success.
reflection.feedback_prompt: What did you learn from building your solution?

conceptualization.title: Prepare Your Presentation
conceptualization.instructions: Create a presentation using Google Slides or Canva to showcase your solution.
conceptualization.kiswahili_support: Tengeneza uwasilishaji kwa kutumia Google Slides au Canva kuonyesha suluhisho lako.
conceptualization.example: We created a Canva presentation with screenshots of our app.
conceptualization.feedback_prompt: Upload your presentation and explain how it communicates your solution.

application.title: Present to Peers and Mentors
application.instructions: Present your solution to peers and mentors, and collect feedback.
application.kiswahili_support: Wasilisha suluhisho lako kwa wenzako na wakufunzi, na kukusanya mrejesho.
application.example: We presented our app to mentors and received suggestions for improvement.
application.feedback_prompt: Upload feedback from your peers and mentors and explain how you will use it.
